topic: How to design edge runtimes using fastapi with Python 3.12+
prompt: Write a Python 3.12+ focused, accurate explainer for: How to design edge runtimes using fastapi with Python 3.12+

response_parsed.title: Designing Edge Runtimes using FastAPI with Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This guide provides a comprehensive overview on designing edge runtimes using FastAPI, a modern, fast (high-performance), web framework for building APIs with Python 3.12+. It covers key points, code examples, version notes, and caveats to help developers understand and implement the process effectively.
key_points: Setting up a FastAPI project in Python 3.12+
Deploying FastAPI applications to edge environments
Optimizing FastAPI for low-latency, high-throughput edge scenarios
version_notes: FastAPI version 0.72.0 is recommended for Python 3.12+ support
UVICORN version 0.17.6 includes the necessary improvements for FastAPI 0.72.0 on Python 3.12+
caveats: Ensure your edge runtime supports Python 3.12+ and the required dependencies
Optimizations may require additional research and testing to achieve desired performance levels in specific edge scenarios
